name: dump
description: Outputs the elements, variables and values of most kinds of CFML objects. Useful for debugging. You can display the contents of simple and complex variables, objects, components, user-defined functions, and other elements.

params.name: format
params.description:
specify the output format of the dump, the following formats are supported:

- simple: - a simple HTML output (no JavaScript or CSS)
- text (default output="console"): plain text output (no HTML)
- html (default output="browser"): regular output with HTML/CSS/JavaScript
- classic: classic view with HTML/CSS/JavaScript

params.name: keys
params.description: For a structure, number of keys to display.

params.name: metainfo
params.description: Includes information about the query in the cfdump results.

params.name: output
params.description:
Where to send the results:

- console: the result is written to the console (System.out).
- browser (default): the result is written to the browser response stream.

params.name: top
params.description: The number of rows to display.

params.name: abort
params.description: stops further processing of the request.

params.name: eval
params.description: name of the variable to display, also used as label, when no label defined.
